name: component

0.name: id
0.description: A unique identifier for a component.

1.name: name
1.description: The component's short, human-readable name.

2.name: component-type
2.description: A category describing the purpose of the component.

description: A defined component that can be part of an implemented system.

title.name: title
title.description: A title for display and navigation

prop.name: prop

0.name: name
0.description: Identifying the purpose and intended use of the property, part or other object.

1.name: id
1.description: Unique identifier of the containing object

2.name: ns
2.description: A namespace qualifying the name.

3.name: class
3.description: Indicating the type or classification of the containing object

prop.description: A value with a name, attributed to the containing control, subcontrol, part, or group.

link.name: link

0.name: href
0.description: A link to a document or document fragment (actual, nominal or projected)

1.name: rel
1.description: Describes the type of relationship provided by the link. This can be an indicator of the link's purpose.

2.name: media-type
2.description: Describes the media type of the linked resource

link.description: A reference to a local or remote resource
